select count(1) as totalcnt from VTUSER where 1=1 and USER_ROLE not in
('ADMIN')
('ADMIN','MANAGER')
and (UNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or UID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

select VIEWID ,UNAME ,DEPT_NM ,ORG_NM ,UID ,ACCEPT_YN ,DESCRIPTION ,UEMAIL ,'' as INITPW ,to_char(a.REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CHAR_CRE_DT from VTUSER a where 1=1 and USER_ROLE not in
('ADMIN')
('ADMIN','MANAGER')
and (UNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or UID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by VIEWID desc OFFSET ${first}-1 ROWS FETCH FIRST ${countPerPage} ROWS ONLY

select count(1) as totalcnt from VTQNA a where DEL_YN !='Y'
AND ANSWER !=''
AND ANSWER =''
and (TITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or QUESTION LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

select a.*, b.UNAME,to_char( a.REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CHAR_CRE_DT ,to_char(a.UPD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CHAR_UPD_DT from VTQNA a , VTUSER b where a.REG_ID = b.VIEWID and DEL_YN !='Y'
AND ANSWER !=''
AND ANSWER =''
and (TITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or QUESTION like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by QNAID desc OFFSET ${first}-1 ROWS FETCH FIRST ${countPerPage} ROWS ONLY

select count(1) as TOTALCNT from VTCONNECTION a
where 1=1
, VTDATABASE_ROLE b where a.VCONNID = b.VCONNID and b.ROLE_TYPE = 'M' and b.VIEWID = #{customParam.uid}
and a.USE_YN = 'Y' and (a.VNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or a.VURL like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

select a.VCONNID ,a.VNAME from VTCONNECTION a
where 1=1
, VTDATABASE_ROLE b where a.VCONNID = b.VCONNID and b.ROLE_TYPE = 'M' and b.VIEWID = #{customParam.uid}
and a.USE_YN = 'Y'
and (a.VNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or a.VURL like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by a.VCONNID desc OFFSET ${first}-1 ROWS FETCH FIRST ${countPerPage} ROWS ONLY
select * from VTUSER a left outer join VTDATABASE_ROLE b on a.VIEWID = b.VIEWID and b.VCONNID = #{vconnid} and b.ROLE_TYPE = 'U' where (b.VCONNID = #{vconnid} or b.VCONNID is null )
